name: Stripe heart cushion
description: This cushion measures 38 x 42 cm, come with cushion insert.

name: Newspaper print cushion
description:
This listing is for a 45cm cushion with typo print, cushion cover is made out of linen. Cushion insert included.

Our inserts are recycled PET fiber, it is derived from 100% post consumer water bottles. The fiber looks, feels and performs in the same way as a high-grade poly fiber, but is completely recycled. For every 1kg of fiber used, we save around 70 water bottles from ending up in landfill. Our Recycled PET fiber is also 100% non-allergenic.

name: The Soap Story all in one gift pack
description:
It's a little hard to find simplicity in today's overloaded world. We have packed together a little box of "zen" for anyone to enjoy some compact, minimal, gentle and kind treats.

Each box contains a slide of dry loofah, a full size bar, 4 mini bars, 1 lip balm. Each box comes with different varieties.

PLEASE NOTE: Handmade soap will last a long time if kept dry between uses. Please use a draining soap dish and keep it away from direct streams of water.
For external use only. Avoid direct contact with eyes. To ensure skin compatibility test product on a small patch of skin prior to use. In the unlikely event of a negative reaction discontinue use and consult your medical practitioner. Store below 21°C

name: 3 soap balls
description: You will get 3 soap balls with strings wrapped in tissue paper and neatly placed in the tube. Hang the soap ball in your bathroom and keep it dry when not in use!

name: Trip to Provence
description:
Moisturising face cleanser for all skin type/ 70g
High-foaming recipe using cold process method.
Ingredient: Coconut Oil, Olive Oil, Avocado Oil, Hazelnut Oil

PLEASE NOTE: Handmade soap will last a long time if kept dry between uses. Please use a draining soap dish and keep it away from direct streams of water.
For external use only. Avoid direct contact with eyes. To ensure skin compatibility test product on a small patch of skin prior to use. In the unlikely event of a negative reaction discontinue use and consult your medical practitioner. Store below 21°C

We try to keep all soap available at all time, but sometimes we might just don't have some soap ready immediately because we sell both online and offline. I will contact you if your order takes more than 2-3 days to arrive. We only ship when the soap is cured, sometimes it can take up to 2 weeks to ship as the curing stage takes 4-6 weeks.
